Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at 46th/California
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California due to, street blockage near 46th/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California due to, street blockage near 46th/California.

Allow extra travel time.
